value:
My father once taught me two
valuable lessons. That a ruler should
know the sorrows of his people.$k$pAnd that there is more than one
truth, no matter what anyone says
to the contrary.

I know how valuable you must be to
Prince Alfonse as his tactician.
I once had one of my own.

Anyone who's borne the heavy weight
of saving the world knows how nice
it is to have the support of others.$k$pSuch people also know how daunting
it can be to...meet their expectations.

Do you fear war? To be honest,
I am often scared of it, to the extent
that it keeps me up at night.

To save everyone that I can, I must
train hard to become every bit as
strong as my father was.

My name is Seliph. I bring word
that you are very important to
$Nf.

How reassuring. Now there is
nothing I need fear.

I am glad to grow stronger.
I may equal my father in time.

Hmm. I must get stronger, if
I possibly can!

Thank you. I sense that this will
help considerably.

I am Seliph, a son pledged to fulfilling
the wish my father made as he died
a bitter death—to battle darkness.

People laud me as a hero and legend,
but I feel like I owe my whole world
an apology.$k$pYou know me better than most,
so you must realize the truth.$k$pI am too weak, too cowardly, to live
up to such a legend. I have truly only
ever wanted one thing—to run away.$k$pStill, I have always done the opposite,
fighting whoever I must. And do
you know why?$k$pBecause I have friends who inspire me,
and you more than most. I need you...
in order to be me. You see?$k$pI pledge to help you any way I can,
ever at your side—now and
well into our future.
はっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
Not... not done yet...
With all my strength!
I will never yield!
I will protect everyone!
Until the end!
Father...
Haha
Something on your mind?
What? Oh, it's you. Tell me. What's going on?
Best to speak the truth—I'll never be as strong as I ought to be.
Have you grown tired from our battles?
I would love to stroll in a market with you sometime—perhaps when our battles are done.
I hope to be like my father someday—great and inspiring.
I vow to work hard—until I'm strong enough to protect you.
Understood.
What can I do?
Let's go.
